title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXIII, pt. 1160 - COMMERCIAL GROUND TRANSPORTATION RULES AND REGULATIONS FOR THE LANDSIDE TERMINAL OPERATIONS AT THE BUFFALO NIAGARA INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT
